metadata.title: CVE-2016-9969 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In libwebp 0.5.1, there is a double free bug in libwebpmux.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: godot package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
libwebp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.1-2').
qtimageformats-opensource-src package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
